00045 ////!< readOn  
00046 //
00047 //
00048 Entree& Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::readOn(Entree& s )
00049 {
00050   le_champ_front.typer("Champ_front_uniforme");
00051   le_champ_front.valeurs().resize(1,dimension);
00052   le_champ_front->fixer_nb_comp(1);
00053   le_champ_ext.typer("Champ_front_uniforme");
00054   le_champ_ext.valeurs().resize(1,dimension);
00055   return s;
00056 }

00065 
00066 void Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::completer()
00067 {
00068 
00069   Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::completer()" << finl;
00070   const Zone_Cl_dis_base& la_zone_Cl = zone_Cl_dis();
00071   const Equation_base& eqn = la_zone_Cl.equation();
00072   const Navier_Stokes_std& eqn_hydr = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,eqn);
00073 
00074 // const Zone_VEF& la_zone_VEF = ref_cast(Zone_VEF,eqn.zone_dis().valeur());
00075 
00076   const Champ_P0_VEF& pression = ref_cast(Champ_P0_VEF,eqn_hydr.pression().valeur());
00077 
00078   pression_interne = pression;
00079 
00080   const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,frontiere_dis());
00081   int nb_faces_loc = le_bord.nb_faces();
00082 
00083   trace_pression_int.resize(nb_faces_loc);
00084 
00085   Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::completer() ok" << finl;
00086 }
00087 
00088 int Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::initialiser(double temps)
00089 {
00090 
00091   int ok=Cond_lim_base::initialiser(temps);
00092 
00093   const Zone_Cl_dis_base& la_zone_Cl = zone_Cl_dis();
00094   const Equation_base& eqn = la_zone_Cl.equation();
00095 // const Navier_Stokes_std& eqn_hydr = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,eqn);
00096   const Zone_VEF& ma_zone_VEF = ref_cast(Zone_VEF,eqn.zone_dis().valeur());
00097   const IntTab& face_voisins  = ma_zone_VEF.face_voisins();
00098 // const Zone_Cl_VEF& zone_Cl_VEF = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_VEF,ma_zone_cl_dis.valeur());
00099 // const DoubleVect& volumes_entrelaces_Cl = zone_Cl_VEF.volumes_entrelaces_Cl();
00100 // const DoubleTab& face_normale = la_zone_VEF.face_normales();
00101   const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,frontiere_dis());
00102   int nb_faces_loc = le_bord.nb_faces();
00103   int ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00104   int nfin = ndeb + nb_faces_loc;
00105   int face;
00106   coeff.resize(nb_faces_loc);
00107   if (dimension == 2)
00108     for (face=ndeb; face<nfin ; face++)
00109       {
00110         int elem=face_voisins(face,0);
00111         if (elem != -1)
00112           coeff[face-ndeb] = distance_2D(face,elem,ma_zone_VEF);
00113         else
00114           {
00115             elem=face_voisins(face,1);
00116             coeff[face-ndeb] = -distance_2D(face,elem,ma_zone_VEF);
00117           }
00118       }
00119   if (dimension == 3)
00120     for (face=ndeb; face<nfin ; face++)
00121       {
00122         int elem=face_voisins(face,0);
00123         if (elem != -1)
00124           coeff[face-ndeb] = distance_3D(face,elem,ma_zone_VEF);
00125         else
00126           {
00127             elem=face_voisins(face,1);
00128             coeff[face-ndeb] = -distance_3D(face,elem,ma_zone_VEF);
00129           }
00130       }
00131   return ok;
00132 }

00134 
00135 void Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::mettre_a_jour(double temps)
00136 {
00137   Cond_lim_base::mettre_a_jour(temps);
00138 
00139   const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,frontiere_dis());
00140   int ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00141   int nb_faces_loc = le_bord.nb_faces();
00142   int nfin = ndeb + nb_faces_loc;
00143 
00144   assert(pression_interne.non_nul());
00145   for (int face=ndeb; face<nfin; face++)
00146     {
00147       trace_pression_int[face-ndeb] = pression_interne->valeur_au_bord(face);
00148     }
00149 
00150 }
00151 
00152 double Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::flux_impose(int face) const
00153 {
00154   const Zone_Cl_dis_base& la_zone_Cl = zone_Cl_dis();
00155   const Equation_base& eqn = la_zone_Cl.equation();
00156   const Navier_Stokes_std& eqn_hydr = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,eqn);
00157   const Zone_VEF& ma_zone_VEF = ref_cast(Zone_VEF,eqn.zone_dis().valeur());
00158   const IntTab& face_voisins  = ma_zone_VEF.face_voisins();
00159 // const Zone_Cl_VEF& zone_Cl_VEF = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_VEF,ma_zone_cl_dis.valeur());
00160 // const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,frontiere_dis());
00161   const IntTab& elem_faces    = ma_zone_VEF.elem_faces();
00162   const DoubleTab& face_normales = ma_zone_VEF.face_normales();
00163   const Champ_P0_VEF& pre = ref_cast(Champ_P0_VEF,eqn_hydr.pression().valeur());
00164 
00165   double Pimp, diff, grad ;
00166 
00167   int elem1, elem2, face_adj, face_face_adj ;
00168 
00169   double a1 = trace_pression_int[face];
00170   double a2 = coeff[face];
00171 
00172   double a3 = 0. ;
00173 
00174   elem1 = face_voisins(face,0);
00175 
00176   for (face_adj=0; face_adj<dimension; face_adj++)
00177     {
00178       face_face_adj= elem_faces(elem1,face_adj);
00179 
00180       elem2 = face_voisins(face_face_adj,0);
00181       if (elem2 != elem1)
00182         {
00183           diff = pre(elem2) - pre(elem1);
00184 
00185           for (int comp=0; comp < dimension; comp++)
00186             {
00187               grad = diff*face_normales(face_face_adj,comp);
00188               a3 += grad ;
00189             }
00190         }
00191     }
00192 
00193   a3 /= double(dimension) ;
00194   Pimp  = a1 + a2 * a3 ;
00195   return Pimp ;
00196 
00197 }
00198 
00199 double Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::flux_impose(int  , int ) const
00200 {
00201   Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::flux_impose(int  , int )" << finl;
00202   Cerr << "On ne sait imposer que la composante normale du gradient" << finl;
00203   return 0.;
00204 }
00205 
00206 double Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::Grad_P_lib_VEF(int face) const
00207 {
00208   const Milieu_base& mil=ma_zone_cl_dis->equation().milieu();
00209   const Champ_Uniforme& rho=ref_cast(Champ_Uniforme,mil.masse_volumique());
00210   double d_rho = rho(0,0);
00211   if (le_champ_front.valeurs().size()==1)
00212     return le_champ_front(0,0)/d_rho;
00213   else if (le_champ_front.valeurs().line_size()==1)
00214     return le_champ_front(face,0)/d_rho;
00215   else
00216     Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::Grad_P_lib_VEF() erreur" << finl;
00217   exit();
00218   return 0.;
00219 }

00221 int Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::
00222 compatible_avec_discr(const Discretisation_base& discr) const
00223 {
00224   if (discr.que_suis_je() == "VEF")
00225     return 1;
00226   else
00227     {
00228       err_pas_compatible(discr);
00229       return 0;
00230     }
00231 }
00232 
00233 int Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_libre_VEF::
00234 compatible_avec_eqn(const Equation_base& eqn) const
00235 {
00236   Motcle dom_app=eqn.domaine_application();
00237   Motcle Hydraulique="Hydraulique";
00238   Motcle indetermine="indetermine";
00239   if ( (dom_app==Hydraulique) || (dom_app==indetermine) )
00240     return 1;
00241   else
00242     {
00243       err_pas_compatible(eqn);
00244       return 0;
00245     }
00246 }
